email_content:
Hi Sarah,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m excited about our upcoming Community Care Day in mid-March at the parish hall and surrounding grounds. Below is a brief overview along with a few items where I’d welcome your input:

• Objective: Bring neighbours together for a day of service that offers free meals, basic health screenings, a small job fair, and fun family activities.

• Key program segments:
  – Welcoming remarks
  – Clothing & food distribution
  – Health check-ups by volunteer medical staff
  – Job fair booths hosted by local employers
  – Activities for children

• Volunteer coordination: Parish volunteers are being confirmed, and your Helping Hands United team is already on board. I’ll share the full roster once final numbers are in.

• Logistics & next steps:
  – Confirm space setup (tables, chairs, signage)
  – Finalize promotional materials (flyers, social media, announcements)
  – Schedule a brief check-in next week to review any remaining details

Please let me know if everything above aligns with your expectations or if there’s anything else we should address.

Thanks so much for your partnership. Looking forward to making this a meaningful day for our community.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]

Session with Michael R. on 10th February. Expressed concerns about his family's financial struggles and is looking forward to the support from the Community Care Day event.
